name: Endless Maze
description:
A short simple game about exploring a seemly endless maze
This game includes:
-Keys
-Coins
-Traps
-Challenge
-Horror
-Demons
-Adventure
-Walls
-Secret Walls
-Ultra Secret Walls
-Flags
-Turrets
-Saws
-Spikes
and of course... you :)

Try to get to the end of the maze, if there is one... as well as getting all twenty achievements!
